title: NEW Span Towers 3 Bedroom
details:
New 3 Bedroom apartment with 2 bathrooms on Havelock road, near the IOC petrol shed at the end of Havelock Road. It includes the pantry fittings, and toilets are with shower cubicles.

This brand new apartment would be completed by the end of this month. It is in close proximity to restaurants, supermarkets and hospitals.
